include.description: Include files from another team/coworker/friend. Should be a git repo

config.description: Properties that snix will use. Configs defined here will override conflicting includes.

items.description: Items that will be installed by snix. Will be combined with those from the include files

customizations.description: Customizations that will be run by snix. Customizations will override conflicting includes.

scriptLocation.description: Location of a customization script. Scripts must reside in the same directory as the manifest.
